stories.text:
Grammarly browser extension is not supported on Hackernews: "For technical reasons, we currently do not check your text on this website."

screenshot: https://i.imgur.com/JlJ23ab.png

I wonder what technical reasons could there be? HN seems like a pretty straightforward site with valid html tags like `textarea`.
stories.title: Ask HN: Why Grammarly browser extension is not supported on HN?

stories.text: Can a developer please help me.. Ive been a victim of a hacker for a while and i need help on how to get rid of this invading of my privacy person
stories.title: Help Please

stories.text:
What's an area that looks promising in the upcoming decade.(like mobile apps in the last decade, or YouTube/content creation in this decade) I'm seeking an area with a decent producers to users ratio.
The whole blockchain/web3 space feels overwhelming.
